attributes.action: Divorce London from The United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
I propose to divorce London from the rest of the United Kingdom, to make London a World City state, that way London can get on with what it cares about most "Money,Banks,Services" and the rest of the united Kingdom can create a new fair United Kingdom that isn't "all about London" This in my opinion is the only way to save the Union, maybe a new Looser union could be created incorporating Rep of Ireland, Ulster,Scotland, Wales, and most of England (and with ties to the English speaking world), the capital could rotate on a yearly basis, no central power base, and investment would be shared amongst the nations.

The action i would like the government to take is to hold a referendum asking the British people "Should London be divorced from the United Kingdom?" Yes or  No?
